View full detailsThis family owned company is great to do business with. They took pride in helping me with the process of the purchasing my flagpole. The installers were awesome too. Bryan and John knew exactly what needed to be done, explained the process to me and did a great job. I'm so happy! Lenore Martorelli Flagman of America is THE best place to get your flag pole and all your flag needs!!! Jordan and staff are very attentive and help you with all your questions and concerns. They explain everything from product description to delivery and installment! I couldn't be happier!!!! I LOVE my fiberglass flagpole and my American flag with the embroidered stars!!! Each has received many compliments! Thank you Jordan and all at Flagman of America!!! Keep up the GREAT work!!! Kathleen Virbil I Highly recommend Flag man of America for your flag pole and accessory needs . Jordan was excellent throughout the entire process and the installation crew did a great job installing my new pole and flags on my corner lot / rental property I’ve been working on for 20 years . I believe the new one piece black 25’ pole to be the crown jewel ! Thank you Jordan and everyone at flagman of America for helping me with this important and personal part of my project. Kevin Wiles Had to change my order. Called and they picked up the phone! No phone tree! Updated my order to LARGER flags and kept the same price. I got MORE for free. I don't often needs flags but I will definitely purchase them from Flagman! Extremely satisfied. Scott Mange We ordered 18 flag poles for our campus (Oakland City University) located in Southern Indiana. Jordan Ahlstrom, was great to work with. I reached out to them them via email and responses were quick and they were very efficient to work with. Paperwork was processed quickly and we received our poles sooner than expected. They put in a extra effort to take care of us since we had a large order. I would highly recommend Flagman of America. Will post pictures once job is complete. Thank you, Kathy Bailey, Executive Assistant for Administration at Oakland City University. Kathy Bailey Bought a 1 piece 25’ aluminum flag pole and flag. They shipped to my house. Nice quality, All made in America! Very helpful with answering all my questions before purchase and installation tips after purchase. Highly recommend. Julian Fileccia Very impressed with the professional and friendly service from this family owned business. Jordan was awesome answering the many questions and concerns we had with getting a replacement for our recently damaged flagpole. We Highly recommend Flagman of America for any of your patriotic needs as they truly care about their customers and country. As a Veteran I salute you all at Flagman of America. John Dory These guys are great, start to finish! They had every part I needed to rejuvenate a 30+ year flagpole. They were well stocked, very knowledgeable, helpful and efficient. I could not have been more satisfied. Highly recommend them. Clint Pagano Thank you for the POW Flag really appreciate it. You guys really are top notch in the Flag business. Awesome customer service and outstanding in helping with the flag I was looking for. I give your service and products 5 or should I make it 6 stars because of all the work you to others out like my self. The Good Paparazzo
